attributes.action: put pressure on the oil companies to reduce petrol prices immediately the world price of oil falls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can the Government not have a 'remit' to see that the publc is not unfairly treated by large corporations?
In the US the world price of oil goes up & day by day petrol prices follow it, the same when it goes down. This way the public does not feel it is being ripped off, unlike in the UK. All I am looking for is the same thing to happen in the UK. I believe the Government should put this point of view to the oil companies.
